# ckmutil

A package containing useful functions to deal with the Cabibbo-Kobayashi-Maskawa (CKM) quark mixing matrix or the Pontecorvo-Maki-Nakagawa-Sakata (PMNS) lepton mixing matrix in high energy physics.
